title: ANSI Escape Sequence Colors not working in Powershell (v0.49.0 issue)
body:
#### Current Behavior
ANSI escape sequences for colour is not working in Windows Terminal anymore in the latest version of starship v0.49

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14130413/106401814-2e023a00-63f4-11eb-967b-4df75e4c6e02.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14130413/106401833-50945300-63f4-11eb-8467-e7554e03f16c.png)



#### Expected Behavior
* Escape sequence to not be printed out literally
* ANSI escape colours to work in Windows Terminal

#### Environment
- Starship version: 0.49.0
- powershell version: <unknown version>
- Operating system: Windows 10.0.19042
- Terminal emulator: <unknown terminal> <unknown version>
- Git Commit Hash: 317226b9
- Branch/Tag: v0.49.0
- Rust Version: rustc 1.49.0 (e1884a8e3 2020-12-29)
- Rust channel: stable-x86_64-pc-windows-msvc (default) release
- Build Time: 2021-01-29 17:46:48
#### Relevant Shell Configuration

```powershell
Set-PSReadlineOption -BellStyle None
Set-Alias -Name vim -Value nvim
Set-Alias -Name open -Value explorer.exe
Set-Alias -Name curl -Value C:\Users\kvnxiao\scoop\apps\curl\current\bin\curl.exe
Set-Alias -Name rml -Value rm.exe
Set-Alias -Name mkdirl -Value mkdir.exe
Set-Alias -Name ssh -Value C:\Users\kvnxiao\scoop\shims\ssh.EXE
Set-Alias -Name scp -Value C:\Users\kvnxiao\scoop\shims\scp.EXE
Set-Alias -Name ssh-keygen -Value C:\Users\kvnxiao\scoop\shims\ssh-keygen.EXE
# Set-Alias -Name ls -Value exa.exe

Invoke-Expression (& {
    $hook = if ($PSVersionTable.PSVersion.Major -lt 6) { 'prompt' } else { 'pwd' }
    (zoxide init --hook $hook powershell) -join "`n"
})

Invoke-Expression (&starship init powershell)

```

#### Starship Configuration

Default
